Maintain your edge with Virtual FNMs

by Unsanctioned Magic

March 22, 2020
in News

If there was a future it would be now! However, for those of us with The True Sight, we all know that time is just an illusion. We are not passive victims of Age and Space. We are their masters! Starting March 27th, our friends over at PDX Magic League are going to begin hosting Virtual FNMs. PDX Magic League a great and growing community who believe in the true honor of wizard battle. Stay connected with the dark power of internet alchemy. Teleport to their Discord server for more details and to get in on some games.
